700425f-a.title: Bronx: Arlington Avenue - 254th Street (West)
700425f-a.text:
Arlington Ave., west side, between West 254th and West 256th Streets,
showing a brick stable on the former G.P. Morisini estate. The view is
northward from within the grounds. The G.W. Bromley map of 1893 shows
this building to have been part of the Martin Bates estate.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700426f-b.title: Bronx: Arlington Avenue - 254th Street (West)
700426f-b.text:
(1)
Arlington Ave., west side, between West 254th and West 258th Streets
(vantage-point,not seen). The view is in a northeasterly direction,
showing part of the stable (left), and greenhouses on the former estate
of G.P. Morisini.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
Aeo Ne 2 1
(2)
The same, another view.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700384f-a.title: Bronx: 254th Street (West) - Arlington Avenue
700384f-a.text:
West 254th Street (foreground, not seen), north side, between
Arlington and Blackstone Aves. The view is in a northerly direction
showing a road within the G.P. Morisini estate.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
N2g N. 2

700383f-b.title: Bronx: 254th Street - Arlington Avenue
700383f-b.text:
(1)
West 254th Street, east from Arlington Ave. On the north side
of the street (left), is the land of the former G.P. Morisini
estate.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The north side of the street as viewed eastward from Netherland

April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.

700424f-a.title: Bronx: Arlington Avenue - 254th Street (West)
700424f-a.text:
Arlington Ave., at the S.E. corner of West 254th Street. The view is
in a southerly direction.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
